mapper.insert: insert into nboard( SEQID ,TITLE ,PASS ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,HITS ,RDATE ,UDATE ) values ( nboard_seq.nextval ,#{title} ,#{pass} ,#{writer} ,#{content} ,'0' ,#{rdate} ,'' )
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT SEQID ,TITLE ,PASS ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,HITS ,RDATE ,UDATE FROM NBOARD ORDER BY SEQID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN >= ${firstIndex} AND RN <= ${lastIndex}
